001package io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.service.facade;
002
003import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.accordion.AccordionService;
004import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.accordion.AccordionServiceImpl;
005import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.alert.AlertService;
006import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.alert.AlertServiceImpl;
007import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.button.ButtonComponentType;
008import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.button.ButtonService;
009import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.button.ButtonServiceImpl;
010import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.checkbox.CheckboxComponentType;
011import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.checkbox.CheckboxService;
012import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.checkbox.CheckboxServiceImpl;
013import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.input.InputComponentType;
014import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.input.InputService;
015import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.input.InputServiceImpl;
016import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.link.LinkComponentType;
017import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.link.LinkService;
018import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.link.LinkServiceImpl;
019import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.list.ItemListComponentType;
020import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.list.ItemListService;
021import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.list.ItemListServiceImpl;
022import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.loader.LoaderService;
023import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.loader.LoaderServiceImpl;
024import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.modal.ModalService;
025import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.modal.ModalServiceImpl;
026import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.radio.RadioComponentType;
027import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.radio.RadioService;
028import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.radio.RadioServiceImpl;
029import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.select.SelectComponentType;
030import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.select.SelectService;
031import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.select.SelectServiceImpl;
032import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.tab.TabService;
033import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.tab.TabServiceImpl;
034import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.table.filters.TableFilter;
035import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.table.insertion.TableInsertion;
036import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.table.registry.TableServiceRegistry;
037import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.table.service.TableService;
038import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.table.service.TableServiceImpl;
039import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.toggle.ToggleService;
040import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.toggle.ToggleServiceImpl;
041import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.insertion.InsertionService;
042import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.insertion.InsertionServiceFieldImpl;
043import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.insertion.InsertionServiceRegistry;
044import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.selenium.smart.SmartWebDriver;
045import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.validator.UiTableValidator;
046import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.validator.UiTableValidatorImpl;
047import lombok.Getter;
048
049/**
050 * Centralized UI service facade that provides access to various UI component services.
051 *
052 * <p>This class serves as a single entry point for interacting with different UI components
053 * such as input fields, buttons, checkboxes, toggles, tables, and more.
054 * It initializes and manages instances of these services, allowing simplified access
055 * throughout the application.
056 *
057 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
058 */
059@Getter
060public class UiService {
061
062   private final SmartWebDriver driver;
063   private final InputService inputField;
064   private final ButtonService buttonField;
065   private final RadioService radioField;
066   private final CheckboxService checkboxField;
067   private final ToggleService toggleField;
068   private final SelectService selectField;
069   private final ItemListService listField;
070   private final LoaderService loaderField;
071   private final LinkService linkField;
072   private final AlertService alertField;
073   private final TabService tabField;
074   private final AccordionService accordionField;
075   private final ModalService modalField;
076   private final InsertionServiceRegistry serviceRegistry;
077   private final InsertionService insertionService;
078   private final TableServiceRegistry tableServiceRegistry;
079   private final TableService tableService;
080   private final UiTableValidator uiTableValidator;
081
082   /**
083    * Constructs the UI service, initializing various UI component services.
084    *
085    * @param driver The {@link SmartWebDriver} instance used for UI interactions.
086    */
087   public UiService(SmartWebDriver driver) {
088      this.driver = driver;
089      inputField = new InputServiceImpl(driver);
090      buttonField = new ButtonServiceImpl(driver);
091      radioField = new RadioServiceImpl(driver);
092      selectField = new SelectServiceImpl(driver);
093      listField = new ItemListServiceImpl(driver);
094      loaderField = new LoaderServiceImpl(driver);
095      linkField = new LinkServiceImpl(driver);
096      alertField = new AlertServiceImpl(driver);
097      tabField = new TabServiceImpl(driver);
098      accordionField = new AccordionServiceImpl(driver);
099      modalField = new ModalServiceImpl(driver);
100      checkboxField = new CheckboxServiceImpl(driver);
101      toggleField = new ToggleServiceImpl(driver);
102      serviceRegistry = new InsertionServiceRegistry();
103      tableServiceRegistry = new TableServiceRegistry();
104      registerInsertionServices();
105      insertionService = new InsertionServiceFieldImpl(serviceRegistry);
106      uiTableValidator = new UiTableValidatorImpl();
107      tableService = new TableServiceImpl(driver, tableServiceRegistry, uiTableValidator);
108   }
109
110   /**
111    * Registers various UI component services to the respective registries.
112    *
113    * <p>This method ensures that UI components such as input fields, radio buttons,
114    * checkboxes, select fields, item lists, and table components are registered
115    * so they can be properly managed and accessed throughout the application.
116    */
117   private void registerInsertionServices() {
118      serviceRegistry.registerService(InputComponentType.class, inputField);
119      serviceRegistry.registerService(RadioComponentType.class, radioField);
120      serviceRegistry.registerService(CheckboxComponentType.class, checkboxField);
121      serviceRegistry.registerService(SelectComponentType.class, selectField);
122      serviceRegistry.registerService(ItemListComponentType.class, listField);
123      tableServiceRegistry.registerService(ButtonComponentType.class, buttonField);
124      tableServiceRegistry.registerService(LinkComponentType.class, linkField);
125      tableServiceRegistry.registerService(InputComponentType.class, (TableFilter) inputField);
126      tableServiceRegistry.registerService(InputComponentType.class, (TableInsertion) inputField);
127   }
128
129}
